mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.name, m.gender, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, tp.tch_photo, s.sch_name, s.sch_type_no from member m left outer join teacher t on m.mem_no = t.tch_no left outer join teacher_photo tp on t.tch_no = tp.tch_no left outer join school s on t.tch_no = s.tch_no where s.sch_type_no = 4 and m.mem_type_no = #{m.mem_type_no}

select t.tch_no, ls.sub_conts, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type from lesson_subject ls left outer join teacher t on t.tch_no = ls.tch_no left outer join subject sub on ls.sub_no = sub.sch_type_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no

select m.mem_no, m.mem_type_no, m.name, m.gender, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type from member m left outer join student stu on m.mem_no= stu.std_no left outer join wanted_lesson wl on stu.std_no = wl.std_no left outer join subject sub on wl.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where m.mem_type_no = #{m.mem_type_no}

select m.mem_no, m.name, m.gender, m.dob, m.profile_photo, m.addr_city, m.addr_sub, m.reg_date, s.sch_name, s.major, s.confirm, t.tch_intro, t.vid_addr, ls.wanted_fee, sub.sub_name, st.sch_type from member m left outer join teacher t on m.mem_no = t.tch_no left outer join school s on t.tch_no = s.tch_no left outer join lesson_subject ls on t.tch_no = ls.tch_no left outer join subject sub on ls.sub_no = sub.sub_no left outer join school_type st on sub.sch_type_no = st.sch_type_no where m.mem_no= #{mem_no}
